abstract: Avdiivka Journal; Ukrainian town of Avdiivka illustrates how war there has become quagmire, with fighting occurring only at night, when monitors tasked by Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe with reporting cease-fire violations are off duty; impotence of monitors speaks to how little is being done to end only active war in Europe.

headline.print_headline: Observers on Bankers’ Hours Miss Most of Ukraine War
headline.main: Keeping Bankers’ Hours, European Observers Miss Most of Ukraine War

keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The fighting between Russian-backed separatists and the Ukrainian Army starts just as the unarmed cease-fire monitors pocket their notebooks and drive away for the day....
lead_paragraph: The fighting between Russian-backed separatists and the Ukrainian Army starts just as the unarmed cease-fire monitors pocket their notebooks and drive away for the day.
